title: What is the Monte-Carlo Masters schedule?
description: The Rolex Monte-Carlo Masters quarter-finals will be contested Friday. Carlos Alcaraz's clash against Frenchman Arthur Fils headlines the action on Court Rainier III, where three-time champion Stefanos Tsitsipas will test his perfect 5-0 Lexus ATP Head2Head record against 13th seed Lorenzo Musetti. Alejandro Davidovich Fokina, a 2022 finalist in the Principality, begins the day against Australian Alexei Popyrin. Eighth seed Alex de Minaur faces Grigor Dimitrov. The doubles quarter-finals will be contested on Court Des Princes. View the full schedule for Friday's play below. Â  ORDER OF PLAY - FRIDAY, 11 APRIL 2025 Court Rainier III - start 11:00 AM Alejandro Davidovich Fokina (ESP) vs Alexei Popyrin (AUS) [12] Arthur Fils (FRA) vs [2] Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) [15] Grigor Dimitrov (BUL) vs [8] Alex de Minaur (AUS) [13] Lorenzo Musetti (ITA) vs [6] Stefanos Tsitsipas (GRE) Court Des Princes - start 11:00 AM [WC] Romain Arneodo (MON) / Manuel Guinard (FRA) vs Rohan Bopanna (IND) / Ben Shelton (USA) [Alt] Rafael Matos (BRA) / Joran Vliegen (BEL) vs [2] Harri Heliovaara (FIN) / Henry Patten (GBR) [4] Kevin Krawietz (GER) / Tim Puetz (GER) vs [7] Julian Cash (GBR) / Lloyd Glasspool (GBR) Not Before 3:30 PM After Suitable Rest - [1] Marcelo Arevalo (ESA) / Mate Pavic (CRO) vs Alex de Minaur (AUS) / Jan-Lennard Struff (GER) [NEWSLETTER FORM]
excerpt: The first clay-court ATP Masters 1000 event of the season continues on Friday at the Rolex Monte-Carlo Masters, where Carlos Alcaraz headlines the action.
text: Monte-Carlo Second seed Alcaraz meets Fils, three-time champ Tsitsipas faces Musetti April 10, 2025 Corinne Dubreuil/ATP Tour The 2025 Rolex Monte-Carlo Masters will be played from 6-13 April. By ATP Staff The Rolex Monte-Carlo Masters quarter-finals will be contested Friday. Carlos Alcaraz's clash against Frenchman Arthur Fils headlines the action on Court Rainier III, where three-time champion Stefanos Tsitsipas will test his perfect 5-0 Lexus ATP Head2Head record against 13th seed Lorenzo Musetti. Alejandro Davidovich Fokina, a 2022 finalist in the Principality, begins the day against Australian Alexei Popyrin. Eighth seed Alex de Minaur faces Grigor Dimitrov. The doubles quarter-finals will be contested on Court Des Princes. View the full schedule for Friday's play below. html:
Monte-Carlo

Second seed Alcaraz meets Fils, three-time champ Tsitsipas faces Musetti

April 10, 2025

Corinne Dubreuil/ATP Tour

The 2025 Rolex Monte-Carlo Masters will be played from 6-13 April. By ATP Staff

The Rolex Monte-Carlo Masters quarter-finals will be contested Friday. Carlos Alcaraz's clash against Frenchman Arthur Fils headlines the action on Court Rainier III, where three-time champion Stefanos Tsitsipas will test his perfect 5-0 Lexus ATP Head2Head record against 13th seed Lorenzo Musetti.

Alejandro Davidovich Fokina, a 2022 finalist in the Principality, begins the day against Australian Alexei Popyrin. Eighth seed Alex de Minaur faces Grigor Dimitrov. The doubles quarter-finals will be contested on Court Des Princes.

View the full schedule for Friday's play below.

ORDER OF PLAY - FRIDAY, 11 APRIL 2025
Court Rainier III - start 11:00 AM
Alejandro Davidovich Fokina (ESP) vs Alexei Popyrin (AUS)
[12] Arthur Fils (FRA) vs [2] Carlos Alcaraz (ESP)
[15] Grigor Dimitrov (BUL) vs [8] Alex de Minaur (AUS)
[13] Lorenzo Musetti (ITA) vs [6] Stefanos Tsitsipas (GRE)

Court Des Princes - start 11:00 AM
[WC] Romain Arneodo (MON) / Manuel Guinard (FRA) vs Rohan Bopanna (IND) / Ben Shelton (USA)
[Alt] Rafael Matos (BRA) / Joran Vliegen (BEL) vs [2] Harri Heliovaara (FIN) / Henry Patten (GBR)
[4] Kevin Krawietz (GER) / Tim Puetz (GER) vs [7] Julian Cash (GBR) / Lloyd Glasspool (GBR)

Not Before 3:30 PM
After Suitable Rest - [1] Marcelo Arevalo (ESA) / Mate Pavic (CRO) vs Alex de Minaur (AUS) / Jan-Lennard Struff (GER)
